group.description: Group to which the deal belongs

stage.description: Stage of the deal in the sales pipeline

title.description: Title or name of the deal

mdate.description: Last modified date of the deal

nextdate.description: Next important date related to the deal

winProbabilityMdate.description: Last modified date of the win probability value

activitycount.description: Number of activities related to the deal

nextdealid.description: ID of the next deal in the sequence

edate.description: Expected closing date of the deal

dealActivities.description: Link to activities related to the deal

contact.description: Link to the contact associated with the deal

contactDeals.description: Link to all deals associated with the contact

group.description: Link to the group of the deal

nextTask.description: Link to the next task related to the deal

notes.description: Link to notes associated with the deal

account.description: Link to the account associated with the deal

customerAccount.description: Link to the customer account related to the deal

organization.description: Link to the organization associated with the deal

owner.description: Link to the owner of the deal

scoreValues.description: Link to score values related to the deal

stage.description: Link to the stage of the deal

tasks.description: Link to tasks associated with the deal

dealCustomFieldData.description: Link to custom field data specific to the deal

isDisabled.description: Flag indicating if the deal is disabled

customerAccount.description: Customer account linked to the deal
